channel.title: Predictors on Monsuru Adepeju's Homepage
channel.description: Recent content in Predictors on Monsuru Adepeju's Homepage

item.title: Predictors: Geographical Processes
item.description: Introduction This section introduces a set of predictive tools for certain geographical processes, such as crime and footfalls. The links to downloading these tools are also provided. 1. Grid-based & Street-based Crime Hotspot Predictors **Self-Exciting Point Process** **Prospective Space-time Scan Statistics** **Prospective Kernel Density Estiamtion Method** **Prospective Hotspotting** 2. Footfall Predictor This tool was developed as a part of the Surf Project funded by ESRC Future Research Leaders scheme.
